mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-native data integration platform built specifically for cloud data warehouses (Snowflake, Databricks, BigQuery). Visual, low-code interface for data engineers and business analysts. More streamlined and cost-effective than Informatica's broad enterprise focus.

mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-native platform built for cloud data warehouses. Visual, low-code interface for engineers and analysts. ETL rated positively for user-friendly interface, cloud integration, visual job orchestration, reliability and scalability.

mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-native platform built for cloud data warehouses (Snowflake, Databricks, BigQuery). Visual, low-code interface accessible to engineers and business analysts. Unlike Informatica's broad enterprise focus, Matillion specializes in leveraging cloud data platform power and scalability. More streamlined and cost-effective for cloud-first organizations.
